about.summary: Distributed processing with NumPy and Zarr.

name: zappy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "zappy" %}
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5f4802f02ee26c6b4292209ff19cb06fece0252ee2128cdc739392fe0049c3e7

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vvv "
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python
  run:
    - python
    - numpy
    - zarr
    - future

test:
  imports:
    - zappy
    # It looks like we need apache_beam which is only available on python 2.7
    # To avoid it as a hard dependency, we comment out the test for zappy.beam
    # - zappy.beam 
    - zappy.direct
    - zappy.executor
    - zappy.spark

about:
  home: https://github.com/lasersonlab/zap
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'
  summary: Distributed processing with NumPy and Zarr.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bebatut
